Class DownloadExecutionController

java.lang.Object
cat.dam.roig.cleanstream.controller.DownloadExecutionController
public class DownloadExecutionController extends Object
Controller responsible for executing downloads using yt-dlp and updating the Swing UI.

Responsibilities

  • Reads user input (URL and download options) and validates required configuration.
  • Builds the correct yt-dlp command based on preferences and selected quality.
  • Executes yt-dlp in the background using a SwingWorker to keep the UI responsive.
  • Parses yt-dlp output lines to:
    • Append logs to the UI
    • Update the progress bar
    • Detect the final downloaded file(s)
  • Supports canceling an ongoing download (stop button).
  • Optionally generates/updates an M3U playlist file.
  • Optionally opens the last downloaded file when the process ends successfully.
  • Triggers a local library refresh scan after successful downloads.

Threading model

  • SwingWorker.doInBackground() runs in a background thread (safe for blocking calls).
  • SwingWorker.process(java.util.List) and SwingWorker.done() run on the EDT and can safely update Swing components.

Note: This controller keeps references to UI components because it coordinates UI state and background execution. It is intentionally not a "pure" service.

Author:
metku

  • Constructor Details

    • DownloadExecutionController

      public DownloadExecutionController(MainFrame mainFrame, PreferencesPanel preferencesPanel, JTextField txtUrl, JTextArea logArea, JButton btnDownload, JButton btnStop, JRadioButton rbAudio, JProgressBar pbDownload, DownloadsController downloadsController)
      Builds a controller that wires together UI components and download execution logic.
      Parameters:
      mainFrame - main window used as owner for dialogs and to access global UI state
      preferencesPanel - preferences panel providing paths and download options
      txtUrl - URL input field
      logArea - log output UI
      btnDownload - download button
      btnStop - stop button
      rbAudio - audio mode radio button
      pbDownload - progress bar
      downloadsController - local library controller (refresh after successful download)

  • Method Details

    • startDownload

      public void startDownload()
      Starts a new download based on the current UI state.

      Flow:

      1. Build and validate a DownloadExecutionController.DownloadContext. If validation fails, the method returns.
      2. Build yt-dlp command using buildYtDlpCommand(DownloadContext).
      3. Prepare the UI (clear log, set progress bar and buttons state).
      4. Create and execute a SwingWorker that runs yt-dlp in the background.

    • stopDownload

      public void stopDownload()
      Requests cancellation of the current download.

      This method:

      • Cancels the current SwingWorker.
      • Updates button states to prevent repeated cancellation attempts.

      The actual process termination is handled inside the worker (see destroyProcessQuiet()).

    • openLastDownloadedFile

      public void openLastDownloadedFile(Component parent, JButton btnOpenLast)
      Opens the last downloaded file, if available.

      If the file is an M3U playlist file (.m3u or .m3u8), the method tries to open it using VLC. Otherwise it uses Desktop.open(File).

      If the file does not exist or cannot be opened, an error dialog is shown and the open button is disabled.

      Parameters:
      parent - parent component used to show dialog messages
      btnOpenLast - button that triggers this action (may be enabled/disabled by this method)

    • getLastDownloadedFile

      public String getLastDownloadedFile()
      Returns the last downloaded file absolute path, if detected.

      This can be used by other parts of the UI to implement actions such as "Open last downloaded file".

      Returns:
      last downloaded file path or null if not available
